item.title: 美国和韩国在 3500 亿美元投资基金问题上陷入僵局
item.description: 美国和韩国在两国同意作为更广泛贸易协定一部分的 3,500 亿美元投资基金的细节问题上陷入僵局，首尔一位高级官员警告说，如果两国不能缩小分歧，甚至造船伙伴关系也会面临风险。【原文：The US and South Korea are in a deadlock over details of a $350 billion investment fund the two countries agreed to as part of a broader trade deal, with a top Seoul official warning that even the shipbuilding partnership is at risk if they fail to narrow the differences.】

item.title: 法国第三季度工业产值下降再添污点
item.description: 本周，随着弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）政府的倒台，法国政府陷入混乱，本季度开局不利，7 月份法国工业生产出现下滑。【原文：French industrial production declined in July in a poor start to the quarter that descended into government chaos this week with the fall of Francois Bayrou’s government.】

item.title: 豪华糖果商 Bateel 据称将探索在沙特阿拉伯进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯的美食生产商和连锁餐厅 Bateel International LLC 正在探索首次公开募股，这项交易将为沙特阿拉伯王国的股票销售浪潮再添一把火。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s gourmet food producer and restaurant chain Bateel International LLC is exploring an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, in a deal that would add to the wave of share sales in the kingdom.】

item.title: 腾讯考虑自 2021 年以来首次出售债券，加入点心热潮
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司正考虑最早于本月出售离岸人民币债券，这是该公司四年来首次公开发债。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. is considering its first public debt offering in four years with a sale of offshore yuan bonds as early as this month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非斯帕尔出售瑞士业务，专注于本土市场
item.description: Spar Group Ltd. 同意以 5900 万美元的价格出售其在瑞士的业务，作为南非收入第二大的零售商，该公司将重点放在国内。【原文：Spar Group Ltd. agreed to sell its Swiss unit for $59 million as South Africa’s second-largest retailer by revenue hones its focus at home.】

item.title: 英美资源集团与泰克达成无溢价合并协议
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）已同意与加拿大泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd. ）进行零溢价合并，这是十多年来最大的矿业交易之一。【原文：Anglo American Plc has agreed to merge with Canada’s Teck Resources Ltd. in a zero premium deal, marking one of the biggest mining transactions in more than a decade.】

item.title: 荷兰政府计划将荷兰银行股份削减至约 20
item.description: 荷兰政府的投资机构荷兰国际金融公司（NLFI）周二在一份声明中表示，荷兰政府计划将其在荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）的持股比例降至约 20%，并将逐步减少在该银行的持股。【原文：The Dutch government plans to lower its stake in ABN Amro Bank NV to about 20% as it gradually pares its holdings in the lender, its investment vehicle NLFI said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际金融公司寻求 3 亿美元资助非洲小型电网建设
item.description: 国际金融公司（International Finance Corp. ）正在建立一个旨在降低非洲小型电网成本的实体，以加快实现到 2030 年让 3 亿非洲人用上电的计划。【原文：The International Finance Corp. is setting up an entity aimed at lowering the cost of mini grids in Africa, to accelerate plans to connect 300 million Africans to electricity by 2030.】

item.title: 蒙特帕斯基接管 Mediobanca，重塑意大利银行业
item.description: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 已获得 Mediobanca SpA 的多数股权，巩固了这一一度难以想象的 160 亿欧元收购案，这将重塑意大利金融业。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA has secured a majority stake in Mediobanca SpA, cementing a once-unthinkable €16 billion takeover that’s set to reshape Italian finance.】

item.title: 高盛从壳牌获得 400 亿美元养老金资产委托
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. won a $40 billion mandate from Shell Plc to oversee pension assets for the energy company, in one of the biggest outsourced deals of its kind.】

item.title: 前谷歌地图和 Siri 高管支持 5900 万美元的欧洲特定行业人工智能基金
item.description: 一家由前硅谷高管支持的新风险投资公司正在寻求筹集高达 5000 万欧元（5870 万美元）的资金，用于投资北欧的初创企业，为企业开发人工智能应用。【原文：A new venture capital company backed by former Silicon Valley executives is seeking to raise as much as €50 million ($58.7 million) to invest in northern European startups building artificial intelligence applications for business.】

item.title: 墨西哥目标 2026 年缩小预算赤字，但增长放缓
item.description: 根据官方支出蓝图，墨西哥政府希望明年的预算赤字与今年的支出相比有所减少。【原文：The Mexican government is looking to trim its budget deficit next year compared to this year’s spending, according to its official spending blueprint.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将下挫，英镑逼近 1.36 美元
沙特太平洋投资基金（PIF）将制定面向本地投资的新战略
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金计划公布一项新的长期战略，以提高投资回报，促进当地经济发展，推动沙特摆脱石油多样化。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund plans to unveil a new long-term strategy as it looks to boost investment returns, bolster the local economy and drive the kingdom’s push to diversify away from oil.】

item.title: ASML 向 Mistral 投资 13 亿欧元，推动欧洲人工智能发展
item.description: 作为战略合作伙伴关系的一部分，ASML Holding NV 将向法国 Mistral AI 公司投资 13 亿欧元（15 亿美元），这是荷兰芯片制造设备公司为欧洲最重要的人工智能初创公司提供支持的一个不同寻常的举动。【原文：ASML Holding NV is investing €1.3 billion ($1.5 billion) in France’s Mistral AI as part of a strategic partnership, an unusual move for the Dutch chipmaking equipment company that shores up Europe’s most important artificial intelligence startup.】

item.title: EcoDataCenter 为人工智能基础设施融资 6 亿欧元
item.description: EcoDataCenter AB 公司筹集了 6 亿欧元（7.03 亿美元）的债务融资，用于在瑞典建设新的数据中心，为人工智能提供动力。【原文：EcoDataCenter AB raised €600 million ($703 million) in debt financing to build new data centers in Sweden that will power artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 印度汽车股因莫迪减税政策增值 330 亿美元
item.description: 印度汽车制造商成为政府削减消费税举措的最大赢家，需求的潜在增长提升了他们的利润前景。【原文：India’s automakers have emerged as the biggest winners of the government’s move to cut consumption taxes, as a potential boost to demand lifts their profit outlook.】

item.title: 包机将从美国接回被拘留的韩国工人
item.description: 韩国将于周三派遣一架包机前往美国，将多达300名在美国移民突袭现代汽车公司和LG能源解决方案有限公司工厂时被拘留的工人带回家。【原文：South Korea will send a chartered plane to the US on Wednesday to bring home as many as 300 workers detained in a US immigration raid on a Hyundai Motor Co.—LG Energy Solution Ltd. site that’s rocked diplomatic ties.】

item.title: Permira 和 Blackstone 向迪拜房地产门户网站投资 5.25 亿美元
item.description: Permira 和 Blackstone 已向总部位于迪拜的 Property Finder 投资 5.25 亿美元，赌迪拜的房地产市场能摆脱繁荣与萧条并存的名声。【原文：Permira and Blackstone have invested $525 million in Dubai-based Property Finder, in a bet the city’s real-estate market can move beyond its boom-and-bust reputation.】

item.title: VinFast 寻求股权投资者，计划 2028 年在美国开设工厂
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast Auto Ltd. 董事长 Le Thi Thu Thuy 表示，该公司预计将于 2028 年在北卡罗来纳州开设其延期的工厂，同时继续寻求股权投资者。【原文：VinFast Auto Ltd. expects to open its delayed North Carolina plant in 2028 while the Vietnamese electric vehicle maker continues to seek equity investors, according to Chairwoman Le Thi Thu Thuy.】

item.title: 据称中国太平考虑出售 20 亿美元可转换债券
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国太平洋保险（集团）股份有限公司正在考虑出售多达 20 亿美元的可转换债券，有可能加入其他中国公司的行列，寻求以低于传统债务的利率筹集资金。【原文：China Pacific Insurance (Group) Co. is considering selling as much as $2 billion of convertible bonds, people familiar with the matter said, potentially joining other Chinese companies seeking to raise funds at lower rates than traditional debt.】

item.title: 中国在推动全球牛肉市场发展中的作用受到经济困境的冲击
item.description: 由于经济放缓挤压了家庭收入，世界第二大牛肉消费国中国的牛肉需求量将在2026年连续第二年下降。【原文：Beef demand in China, the world’s second-largest consumer, is set to decline for a second straight year in 2026, as a slowing economy squeezes household income.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车业巨头大肆宣扬电动汽车的卓越性能，同时警告禁止使用内燃机汽车
item.description: 在本周的慕尼黑车展上，欧洲的汽车企业高管们正走在一条艰难的道路上：一方面大肆宣扬他们的新型电动汽车有多么出色，另一方面又警告布鲁塞尔，他们不可能在十年内只销售电动汽车。【原文：European car executives are walking a fine line at this week’s Munich auto show: Touting how swell their new electric vehicles are, while on the other hand warning Brussels that they can’t possibly sell only EVs in ten years’ time.】

item.title: Primark 所有者 AB Foods 努力解决糖的问题
item.description: 上个月，英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods Plc）的生物乙醇工厂成为英国与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）贸易谈判的牺牲品，供应商、客户和工人的生态系统首当其冲。【原文：When Associated British Foods Plc’s bioethanol plant became a casualty last month of the UK’s trade negotiations with President Donald Trump, an ecosystem of suppliers, clients and workers bore the brunt.】

item.title: L&G 募集 6 亿欧元数据中心基金，推动私人市场发展
item.description: 法律与通用集团公司（Legal & General Group Plc）为数字基础设施基金募集了 6 亿欧元（7.04 亿美元）资金，这是英国最大的资产管理公司拓宽其私人市场产品的最新举措。【原文：Legal & General Group Plc has raised €600 million ($704 million) for a digital infrastructure fund, the latest move by the UK’s largest asset manager to broaden its private-markets offerings.】

item.title: 英国支持的贷款机构呼吁各基金支持国防投资
item.description: 国有英国商业银行首席执行官表示，英国养老基金应该为宣布投资国防企业而感到自豪，因为政治气候已经发生变化，声誉风险正在降低。【原文：UK pension funds should be proud to declare investments in defense companies because the political climate has changed and reputational risks are diminishing, the chief executive of the state-owned British Business Bank said.】

item.title: 印尼新任财政部长誓言维持财政纪律
item.description: 印尼新任财政部长布尔巴亚-尤迪-萨德瓦（Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa）誓言维护财政纪律，同时暗示他将允许比前任财政部长更多的国家支出。【原文：Indonesia’s new finance minister Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa vowed to maintain fiscal discipline even as he hinted he’d allow more state spending than his predecessor.】

item.title: 据说新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）和软银正在考虑出售金融科技公司的股份 VNLife
item.description: 据知情人士透露，新加坡政府投资有限公司（GIC Pte.）和软银愿景基金（SoftBank Vision Fund）正在考虑出售其在越南金融科技公司 VNLife 的股份。【原文：GIC Pte. and SoftBank Vision Fund are considering selling their stakes in Vietnamese fintech firm VNLife, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 政治风险加剧，高盛、美国银行青睐瑞士法郎而非日元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Bank of America Corp. strategists are backing the Swiss Franc over the yen, with rising political uncertainty undermining the appeal of the Japanese currency as a safe-haven asset.】

item.title: 政策和贷款推动中国房地产股大涨
item.description: 中国房地产股在香港大涨，碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese property shares surged in Hong Kong, led by Country Garden Holdings Co., as analysts pointed to a mix of policy signals and new lending rules as key drivers of the rally.】
